name: Smush.it
body:
#Smush.it to Shell This app will send files to Yahoo Smush.it optimize and download to your computer ## Installation To install you need just copy file. ## Requirements Just need curl ## Options Use smush.it to optimize images.
By Vinicius Muniz < http://viniciusmuniz.com >
smush [options] file1 [file2] [file3]
-h, --help Show this help
-o,--override Override Image
-d,--dest-path Path of destination
## More Data Access http://viniciusmuniz.com or send me an email: vinicius@viniciusmuniz.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
